attributes.action: Invite All Scottish SPFL Football Clubs To Compete In The FA Cup.
attributes.additional_details: In the past Scottish Football clubs were invited to compete in the FA Cup. I would again like to see all Scottish SPFL clubs to be invited into the third round draw of the FA cup. I believe this would add a new, exciting element to this great cup competition.

rejection.details: For the FA and SFA to discuss.
